website_summaries.verdict: The bath time dolls are more durable and have waterproof molded plastic outfits.
pros: Good quality for a bath toy
Some princesses have hair that changes color (but not Tiana)
There are several different princess versions of the bath time doll on the market
cons: Tiana's hair is not molded plastic like the rest of her
It looks better that way, but it might get messy over time

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any Princess Tiana fan
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and perfect for my daughter who loves Princess Tiana I originally got this for my daughter for Christmas but am putting in in her Easger basket instead she will love it looks just like the picture perfect for any Tiana fan.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: A great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I like Elsa and Anna, too: however, if your child doesn't look like them, and you are looking for a doll that does looks like them, this is a great doll. Our little one plays with this one in the pool and the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Love Tiana!
customer_reviews.text: This a very cute doll that floats and moves well. My daughter loves playing with Tiana in the pool and bathtub!
customer_reviews.author: WPMuse

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her bath time, and it is a very basic doll, no frills, nothing special just something to entertain her in the tub. Luckily she has other toys, so this one isn't as big a bore. I do love the fact that her swimsuit is built on
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: ... in the tub but my 4 year old niece loved her and immediately asked if she could take a ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how well she holds up in the tub but my 4 year old niece loved her and immediately asked if she could take a bath!😀
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great  for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a barbie doll that my daughter (who is one year) can play with and not have to worry about small accessories, and can get wet without ruining the doll itself and introduce her to barbie dolls. I'm am glad I bought this doll. Perfect for playing in the tub. Great first doll.
customer_reviews.author: Shai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have a modest, easy to care for doll! And we love the flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Billing

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What it Looks Like
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what it looks like an inexpensive Princess Tiana doll—serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves bath doll and it is s very beautiful doll!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old really loves it. Definitely recommend this purchase. :))
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: this doll is gorgeous and very pretty. i love the design and it is perfect for collectors. nice buy!
customer_reviews.text: this doll is gorgeous and very pretty. i love the design and it is perfect for collectors. nice buy!
customer_reviews.author: Therese Mary

product_meta.title: Disney Princess Tiana Bath Doll
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Disney Princess Bath Doll Collection: Five pretty princesses are ready to make a royal splash at bath time. And naturally these bathing beauties look just as magnificent in their shimmering swimsuits, sarongs and tiara-style sunglasses as they do in their royal ball gowns. Each doll sold separately, collect them all.
feature_bullets: Princess Tiana is making a royal splash at bath time
Girls can take her for a swim for some underwater magic
Includes swimsuit, sarong, and tiara styled sunglasses
A wonderful gift that any girl is sure to love

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars22 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
